message: Let's start strong! I propose a 60/40 split. Take it or leave it - but we both get a good start!
Considering the inflation, I think a 55/45 split in my favor is fair. Let's settle this round!
Okay, Bob, let's try this again. Considering your inflation and my continued value, I'll offer you 45. Final offer!
Given the inflation hitting me harder, I'm willing to compromise at a 50/50 split this round. It's fair for both of us considering the circumstances. Let's end this now!
